text: Aleksandr Nikolayevich Osatkin-Vladimirsky (1885-1937) was a first secretary of the Byelorussian SSR from 1923 to 1924. Category:1885 births Category:1937 deaths Category:People from Kostroma Governorate Category:Old Bolsheviks Category:Heads of the Communist Party of Byelorussia Category:Great Purge victims from Russia ==References==
title: Aleksandr Osatkin-Vladimirsky
